Review.Titre: The same inability to upload the new…
Review.Contenu: The same inability to upload the new software release for MBM occurred for a second time in a row when the update was announced. The first time this occurred, it was suggested that I complete the update via the product web page, mentioning that the issue would be resolved at a future time.  The following update the same problem occurred.  The response to my second inquiry about this was paltry.
Mail Verifier stops frequently, you have to restart from time to time. Older versions did not have this issue.

Review.Titre: MBM ok, mlm and support: the opposite
Review.Contenu: If you want to use MBM with mlm, a PHP script to manage subsriptions on your Website and synchronize them with MBM, at least find and download the standalone version and fix all errors by yourself, as the script bundled with the mac download has not been updated to the fixed version and contains a flaw which does prevent it from using SMTP. Version 3.2.0 contains a typo. Although I had to find the error by myself and reported it 2 weeks ago, the mac download as of today has not been updated and support didn't even react verbally on that report. The standalone version 3.2.1 states it to be fixed since 2019-11-29, which as of today is more than six months ago.Test mlm thoroughly before buying MBM, as support comes in the form of  not reading messages, "mlm is a free script", "I don't know" and "why should I answer, if I don't know?" and that's about the end of it. No questions more than asking for screenshots, no info about system requirements. Have a look at the style of support in the forums for it and you'll see what I mean.But as if this weren't enough, add a hint on the website to set register_globals to "on" in order to circumvent problems with the script, which in terms of security has been known as irresponsible for years. The script contains undeclared variables.Knowing all of the above beforehand would have prevented 2 people spending several hours trying to find and fix errors and getting useful or even just interested, friendly and timely answers from support.2 points, because of the easy refund and because MBM in itself seems to work good as a standalone solution. Its interface could be a bit less 2002, though.I hope I could prevent my emotions from influencing this report and it is of help for others in search of a toolset for mailing list management.---------------UPDATE 2 weeks after my initial review:Concerning the reply: qed (= not addressing any problems mentioned in the review).The Mac software package still has not been updated with mlm 3.2.1. I just cannot understand why a developer does not care about delivering software with known and already fixed bugs frustrating his potential customers. I can come up with many good and bad explanations for such behaviour. MBM is a useful software, just be warned that if you need to integrate subscriber management on your website and/or need to use SMTP for sending mails, you're on your own. My advice is: get the fixed standalone download of mlm and check it thoroughly. Do not set REGISTER_GLOBALS to ON, as is suggested in the FAQ.UPDATE 3The point is that I have neither been bombarded with questions (but with unrelated tutorial videos) nor have I received a reply on the mail with the screenshots until I asked for it some days later. Then the answer was the question, why you should answer at all, if you didn't have any idea.Sorry, but there's been more than one strange moments in our communication. Not a single one of your messages addressed the questions asked or provided any helpful hints, e.g. about system requirements or that there already is a fixed version of the script or whatever.Enough with that. Have a nice day and happy clients from now on.

Review.Titre: Stable and robust cash management tool
Review.Contenu: Stable and robust cash management tool. I am using iCash for several years without any problem.BUT no innovation since I use it and no new functionality. Limited export capability (ie to supplement missing functionalities in Excel or PowerBi).

Review.Titre: Its a good tool; I have had some difficulties
Review.Contenu: The tool is great and we have been using it for a few years now. I found a few shortcoming that I have not been able to solve:1. When saving the presets in importing list from a remote database, the names given to each preset gets duplicated and mixed. This has been a source of great difficulties for the operators2. the stying of the text of the message is limited. We use styled text. I cannot indent paragraphs.3. I recently paid for the annual support. Since then, my importing from remote database stopped working! Its strange; but it is true! my desktop works fine; my laptop doesn't work.

The program works, and is quite affordable.  I have used it for several years, and have never had the experience that everything worked correctly the first time.  But with a little finesse and patience, it always seems to get the job done.  Recently, I've had to change security settings temporarily in Google in order for the program to access my mail account as google considers the app "less secure."

Review.Titre: iCash: UI is the the most weak side of the app…
Review.Contenu: UI is the the most weak side of the app and should be heavily improved, especially the transactions area (view, edit and insert, merging and spliting) as it is the budget area. Since the ui is a very important side, I would give 2 stars, but I like its way to organise the balance and the profits and loss so I give 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Very good but could be better.
Review.Contenu: I really like this program and its ease of use. I also like the features added in the most recent update. However I do notice some glitches. I could never get through a list of 4700+ names after letting the program run for hours (overnight). It only ever got to 99%. The older version always completed these lists.  Another more glaring glitch was seeing a long list (over 300) of email addresses that were marked as Bad and "impossible to test this email address". But when I ran those same names individually most of them came back as vaild. But on those names I ran them twice as individuals. Some reported bad initially then either automatically changed to valid or were marked valid upon a second testing.  Please work on those items and you will have a perfect program! Customer service was quick and responsive on these issues.

In general i'm happy to use Maxprog. There are two main problems;1- Format of the message that i want to mail in review panel is different than the sent mail. Sometimes its really hard to share a link. (It gives link (link)) instead)2- Can not use the program in macbook. Don't know why.
The app works well overall. The "budget" side of iCash needs to be beefed up to allow for month by month different amounts budgeting to reflect reality.
If you want to send bulk emails: choose MaxBulk Mailer...

I give Maxprog my highest recommendation for small nonprofits (like myself) or 1-2 person businesses who don't have a huge IT budget. iCash is my latest purchase, and I'm totally pleased with it. A bit of a learning curve from Quicken, but meets all my needs.

Reliable, incredibly useful and valuable tool. Highly recommend!
